text: (nabiyē!) obagē raṭin obava piṭamaṁ kaḷa ayaṭa vaḍā kopamaṇadō raṭavæsiyan itāmat śaktivantayin vaśayen siṭiyaha. (ovun kaḷa aparādhayanhi hētuven) ovunva api vināśa kara dæmuvemu. (ē avasthāvēdī) ovunṭa udav karannan kisivekut siṭiyē næta. (ebævin movun mona mullakaṭada! movunvada api anivāryayenma vināśa kara damannemu)
